channel.title: They Might Be Giants Podcast Archive
channel.itunes:author: They Might Be Giants
channel.description: This might be the official podcast of They Might Be Giants, the same band that you may know better as They Might Be Giants. Famous for measuring the distance between the Earth and the Moon and the discovery of Hydrogen
channel.itunes:subtitle: The official podcast of They Might Be Giants.
channel.itunes:summary: This might be the official podcast of They Might Be Giants, the same band that you may know better as They Might Be Giants. Famous for measuring the distance between the Earth and the Moon and the discovery of Hydrogen
channel.itunes:keywords: They Might Be Giants, TMBG, John Flansburgh, John Linnell, Birdhouse in Your Soul, Istanbul, Homestar,

item.title: Podcast 1A
item.itunes:author: They Might Be Giants
item.description: This first episode features the music of Brooklyn rock legends They Might Be Giants. Highlights include exclusive recordings, live recordings and new tracks off their Venue Songs DVD/CD set. Hosted by public radio's Duke of Dead Air-Cecil Portesque-broadcasting from a secret, very rainy location.
item.itunes:subtitle: This is a podcast for people who understand They Might Be Giants.
item.itunes:summary: This is a podcast for people who understand They Might Be Giants.
item.itunes:keywords: They Might Be Giants, TMBG, John Flansburgh, John Linnell, Birdhouse in Your Soul, Istanbul, Homestar,

item.title: Podcast 2A
item.itunes:author: They Might Be Giants
item.description: Includes exclusive They Might Be Giants live recordings, rarities and preview tracks. Including, "Why Did You Grow a Beard", "Fingertips LIve", "Untitled Track" from Tire Damage, "Taste the Fame", "The World that Swings", "The Deranged Millionaire", "Raliegh", and "Robot Parade".
item.itunes:subtitle: This is a podcast for people who understand They Might Be Giants.
item.itunes:summary: This is a podcast for people who understand They Might Be Giants.
item.itunes:keywords: They Might Be Giants, TMBG, John Flansburgh, John Linnell, Birdhouse in Your Soul, Istanbul, Homestar,

item.title: Podcast 3A
item.itunes:author: They Might Be Giants
item.description: Includes exclusive They Might Be Giants live recordings, rarities and preview tracks. Including " Miniature Sidewalk Whirlwind," "Valentine," "The Long Grift," "Love Is Eternity," and much more! Plus The Last Car performing "So Easy to Love," "Running Strong," and "Tell Us Mr. T".
item.itunes:subtitle: This is a podcast for people who understand They Might Be Giants.
item.itunes:summary: This is a podcast for people who understand They Might Be Giants.
item.itunes:keywords: They Might Be Giants, TMBG, John Flansburgh, John Linnell, Birdhouse in Your Soul, Istanbul, Homestar,

item.title: Podcast 4A
item.itunes:author: They Might Be Giants
item.description: Includes exclusive They Might Be Giants live recordings, rarities and preview tracks. Including "Venue Songs" New Year's Live and much more! Plus TMBG ringtones previewed and songs from Cartoon Network's "Dexter's Laboratory" and "Courage the Cowardly Dog".
item.itunes:subtitle: This is a podcast for people who understand They Might Be Giants.
item.itunes:summary: This is a podcast for people who understand They Might Be Giants.
